item.title: Re: ABOUT SPECIAL MISSION
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Re: ABOUT SPECIAL MISSION
item.content:encoded: tq, 4 that correction grammar of mine. i really appreciate it. tq.

item.title: Re: ABOUT SPECIAL MISSION
item.content:encoded:
is there possible that mission will out or change to another when several times played cant pass it ? how long or when that happen ?

tq

I am sorry I just could not let this go. I must correct this.

Is it possible that a mission will change to another type? (Tai/Nin/Gen) after you come across it and fail several times? If so how long till it happens/when it happens?

tq

item.title: Re: ABOUT SPECIAL MISSION
item.content:encoded: Missions will not change just because you have been failing them. They only change when the game designer changes them.
